2783
2799static void
2800mos_gem_bo_clear_relocs(struct mos_linux_bo *bo, int start)
2801{
2802 struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem = (struct mos_bufmgr_gem *) bo->bufmgr;
2803 struct mos_bo_gem *bo_gem = (struct mos_bo_gem *) bo;
2804 int i;
2805 struct timespec time;
2806
2807 clock_gettime(CLOCK_MONOTONIC, &time);
2808
2809 assert(bo_gem->reloc_count >= start);
2810
2811 /* Unreference the cleared target buffers */
2812 pthread_mutex_lock(&bufmgr_gem->lock);
2813
2814 for (i = start; i < bo_gem->reloc_count; i++) {
2815 struct mos_bo_gem *target_bo_gem = (struct mos_bo_gem *) bo_gem->reloc_target_info[i].bo;
2816 if (&target_bo_gem->bo != bo) {
2817 bo_gem->reloc_tree_fences -= target_bo_gem->reloc_tree_fences;
2818 target_bo_gem->used_as_reloc_target = false;
2819 target_bo_gem->reloc_count = 0;
2820 mos_gem_bo_unreference_locked_timed(&target_bo_gem->bo,
2821 time.tv_sec);
2822 }
2823 }
2824 bo_gem->reloc_count = start;
2825
2826 for (i = 0; i < bo_gem->softpin_target_count; i++) {
2827 struct mos_bo_gem *target_bo_gem = (struct mos_bo_gem *) bo_gem->softpin_target[i].bo;
2828 mos_gem_bo_unreference_locked_timed(&target_bo_gem->bo, time.tv_sec);
2829 }
2830 bo_gem->softpin_target_count = 0;
2831
2832 pthread_mutex_unlock(&bufmgr_gem->lock);
2833
2834}
2835
2841static void
2842mos_gem_bo_process_reloc(struct mos_linux_bo *bo)
2843{
2844 struct mos_bo_gem *bo_gem = (struct mos_bo_gem *) bo;
2845 int i;
2846
2847 if (bo_gem->relocs == nullptr)
2848 return;
2849
2850 for (i = 0; i < bo_gem->reloc_count; i++) {
2851 struct mos_linux_bo *target_bo = bo_gem->reloc_target_info[i].bo;
2852
2853 if (target_bo == bo)
2854 continue;
2855
2856 mos_gem_bo_mark_mmaps_incoherent(bo);
2857
2858 /* Continue walking the tree depth-first. */
2859 mos_gem_bo_process_reloc(target_bo);
2860
2861 /* Add the target to the validate list */
2862 mos_add_validate_buffer(target_bo);
2863 }
2864}
2865
2866static void
2867mos_gem_bo_process_reloc2(struct mos_linux_bo *bo)
2868{
2869 struct mos_bo_gem *bo_gem = (struct mos_bo_gem *)bo;
2870 int i;
2871
2872 if (bo_gem->relocs == nullptr && bo_gem->softpin_target == nullptr)
2873 return;
2874
2875 for (i = 0; i < bo_gem->reloc_count; i++) {
2876 struct mos_linux_bo *target_bo = bo_gem->reloc_target_info[i].bo;
2877
2878 if (target_bo == bo)
2879 continue;
2880
2881 mos_gem_bo_mark_mmaps_incoherent(bo);
2882
2883 /* Continue walking the tree depth-first. */
2884 mos_gem_bo_process_reloc2(target_bo);
2885
2886 /* Add the target to the validate list */
2887 mos_add_reloc_objects(bo_gem->reloc_target_info[i]);
2888 }
2889
2890 for (i = 0; i < bo_gem->softpin_target_count; i++) {
2891 struct mos_linux_bo *target_bo = bo_gem->softpin_target[i].bo;
2892
2893 if (target_bo == bo)
2894 continue;
2895
2896 mos_gem_bo_mark_mmaps_incoherent(bo);
2897 mos_gem_bo_process_reloc2(target_bo);
2898 mos_add_softpin_objects(bo_gem->softpin_target[i]);
2899 }
2900}
2901
2902static void
2903mos_update_buffer_offsets(struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem)
2904{
2905 int i;
2906
2907 for (i = 0; i < bufmgr_gem->exec_count; i++) {
2908 struct mos_linux_bo *bo = bufmgr_gem->exec_bos[i];
2909 struct mos_bo_gem *bo_gem = (struct mos_bo_gem *) bo;
2910
2911 /* Update the buffer offset */
2912 if (bufmgr_gem->exec_objects[i].offset != bo->offset64) {
2913 MOS_DBG("BO %d (%s) migrated: 0x%08x %08x -> 0x%08x %08x\n",
2914 bo_gem->gem_handle, bo_gem->name,
2915 upper_32_bits(bo->offset64),
2916 lower_32_bits(bo->offset64),
2917 upper_32_bits(bufmgr_gem->exec_objects[i].offset),
2918 lower_32_bits(bufmgr_gem->exec_objects[i].offset));
2919 bo->offset64 = bufmgr_gem->exec_objects[i].offset;
2920 bo->offset = bufmgr_gem->exec_objects[i].offset;
2921 }
2922 }
2923}
2924
2925static void
2926mos_update_buffer_offsets2 (struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem, mos_linux_context *ctx, mos_linux_bo *cmd_bo)
2927{
2928 int i;
2929
2930 for (i = 0; i < bufmgr_gem->exec_count; i++) {
2931 struct mos_linux_bo *bo = bufmgr_gem->exec_bos[i];
2932 struct mos_bo_gem *bo_gem = (struct mos_bo_gem *)bo;
2933
2934 /* Update the buffer offset */
2935 if (bufmgr_gem->exec2_objects[i].offset != bo->offset64) {
2936 /* If we're seeing softpinned object here it means that the kernel
2937 * has relocated our object... Indicating a programming error
2938 */
2939 assert(!bo_gem->is_softpin);
2940 MOS_DBG("BO %d (%s) migrated: 0x%08x %08x -> 0x%08x %08x\n",
2941 bo_gem->gem_handle, bo_gem->name,
2942 upper_32_bits(bo->offset64),
2943 lower_32_bits(bo->offset64),
2944 upper_32_bits(bufmgr_gem->exec2_objects[i].offset),
2945 lower_32_bits(bufmgr_gem->exec2_objects[i].offset));
2946 bo->offset64 = bufmgr_gem->exec2_objects[i].offset;
2947 bo->offset = bufmgr_gem->exec2_objects[i].offset;
2948 }
2949
2950 if(!bufmgr_gem->use_softpin)
2951 {
2952 if (cmd_bo != bo) {
2953 auto item_ctx = ctx->pOsContext->contextOffsetList.begin();
2954 for (; item_ctx != ctx->pOsContext->contextOffsetList.end(); item_ctx++) {
2955 if (item_ctx->intel_context == ctx && item_ctx->target_bo == bo) {
2956 item_ctx->offset64 = bo->offset64;
2957 break;
2958 }
2959 }
2960 if ( item_ctx == ctx->pOsContext->contextOffsetList.end()) {
2961 struct MOS_CONTEXT_OFFSET newContext = {ctx,
2962 bo,
2963 bo->offset64};
2964 ctx->pOsContext->contextOffsetList.push_back(newContext);
2965 }
2966 }
2967 }
2968 }
2969}
2970
2971drm_export int
2972do_exec2(struct mos_linux_bo *bo, int used, struct mos_linux_context *ctx,
2973 drm_clip_rect_t *cliprects, int num_cliprects, int DR4,
2974 unsigned int flags, int *fence
2975 )
2976{
2977
2978 struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem = (struct mos_bufmgr_gem *)bo->bufmgr;
2979 struct drm_i915_gem_execbuffer2 execbuf;
2980 int ret = 0;
2981 int i;
2982
2983 if (to_bo_gem(bo)->has_error)
2984 return -ENOMEM;
2985
2986 switch (flags & 0x7) {
2987 default:
2988 return -EINVAL;
2989 case I915_EXEC_BLT:
2990 if (!bufmgr_gem->has_blt)
2991 return -EINVAL;
2992 break;
2993 case I915_EXEC_BSD:
2994 if (!bufmgr_gem->has_bsd)
2995 return -EINVAL;
2996 break;
2997 case I915_EXEC_VEBOX:
2998 if (!bufmgr_gem->has_vebox)
2999 return -EINVAL;
3000 break;
3001 case I915_EXEC_RENDER:
3002 case I915_EXEC_DEFAULT:
3003 break;
3004 }
3005
3006 pthread_mutex_lock(&bufmgr_gem->lock);
3007 /* Update indices and set up the validate list. */
3008 mos_gem_bo_process_reloc2(bo);
3009
3010 /* Add the batch buffer to the validation list. There are no relocations
3011 * pointing to it.
3012 */
3013 mos_add_validate_buffer2(bo, 0);
3014
3015 memclear(execbuf);
3016 execbuf.buffers_ptr = (uintptr_t)bufmgr_gem->exec2_objects;
3017 execbuf.buffer_count = bufmgr_gem->exec_count;
3018 execbuf.batch_start_offset = 0;
3019 execbuf.batch_len = used;
3020 execbuf.cliprects_ptr = (uintptr_t)cliprects;
3021 execbuf.num_cliprects = num_cliprects;
3022 execbuf.DR1 = 0;
3023 execbuf.DR4 = DR4;
3024 execbuf.flags = flags;
3025 if (ctx == nullptr)
3026 i915_execbuffer2_set_context_id(execbuf, 0);
3027 else
3028 i915_execbuffer2_set_context_id(execbuf, ctx->ctx_id);
3029 execbuf.rsvd2 = 0;
3030 if((flags & I915_EXEC_FENCE_SUBMIT) || (flags & I915_EXEC_FENCE_IN))
3031 {
3032 execbuf.rsvd2 = *fence;
3033 }
3034 else if(flags & I915_EXEC_FENCE_OUT)
3035 {
3036 execbuf.rsvd2 = -1;
3037 }
3038
3039 if (bufmgr_gem->no_exec)
3040 goto skip_execution;
3041
3042 ret = drmIoctl(bufmgr_gem->fd,
3043 DRM_IOCTL_I915_GEM_EXECBUFFER2_WR,
3044 &execbuf);
3045 if (ret != 0) {
3046 ret = -errno;
3047 if (ret == -ENOSPC) {
3048 MOS_DBG("Execbuffer fails to pin. "
3049 "Estimate: %u. Actual: %u. Available: %u\n",
3050 mos_gem_estimate_batch_space(bufmgr_gem->exec_bos,
3051 bufmgr_gem->exec_count),
3052 mos_gem_compute_batch_space(bufmgr_gem->exec_bos,
3053 bufmgr_gem->exec_count),
3054 (unsigned int) bufmgr_gem->gtt_size);
3055 }
3056 }
3057
3058 if (ctx != nullptr)
3059 {
3060 mos_update_buffer_offsets2(bufmgr_gem, ctx, bo);
3061 }
3062
3063 if(flags & I915_EXEC_FENCE_OUT)
3064 {
3065 *fence = execbuf.rsvd2 >> 32;
3066 }
3067
3068skip_execution:
3069 if (bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.debug)
3070 mos_gem_dump_validation_list(bufmgr_gem);
3071
3072 for (i = 0; i < bufmgr_gem->exec_count; i++) {
3073 struct mos_bo_gem *bo_gem = to_bo_gem(bufmgr_gem->exec_bos[i]);
3074
3075 bo_gem->idle = false;
3076
3077 /* Disconnect the buffer from the validate list */
3078 bo_gem->validate_index = -1;
3079 bufmgr_gem->exec_bos[i] = nullptr;
3080 }
3081 bufmgr_gem->exec_count = 0;
3082 pthread_mutex_unlock(&bufmgr_gem->lock);
3083
3084 return ret;
3085}
3086
3087static int
3088do_exec3(struct mos_linux_bo **bo, int _num_bo, struct mos_linux_context *ctx,
3089 drm_clip_rect_t *cliprects, int num_cliprects, int DR4,
3090 unsigned int _flags, int *fence
3091 )
3092{
3093 uint64_t flags = _flags;
3094 uint64_t num_bo = _num_bo;
3095 if((bo == nullptr) || (ctx == nullptr) || (num_bo == 0))
3096 {
3097 return -EINVAL;
3098 }
3099
3100 struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem = (struct mos_bufmgr_gem *)bo[0]->bufmgr;
3101 struct drm_i915_gem_execbuffer2 execbuf;
3102 int ret = 0;
3103 int i;
3104
3105 pthread_mutex_lock(&bufmgr_gem->lock);
3106
3107 struct mos_exec_info exec_info;
3108 memset(static_cast<void*>(&exec_info), 0, sizeof(exec_info));
3109 exec_info.batch_obj = (struct drm_i915_gem_exec_object2 *) calloc (num_bo, sizeof(struct drm_i915_gem_exec_object2));
3110 if(exec_info.batch_obj == nullptr)
3111 {
3112 ret = -ENOMEM;
3113 goto skip_execution;
3114 }
3115 exec_info.obj_remain_size = OBJ512_SIZE;
3116 exec_info.obj = (struct drm_i915_gem_exec_object2 *) calloc (OBJ512_SIZE, sizeof(struct drm_i915_gem_exec_object2));
3117 if(exec_info.obj == nullptr)
3118 {
3119 ret = -ENOMEM;
3120 goto skip_execution;
3121 }
3122
3123 for(i = 0; i < num_bo; i++)
3124 {
3125 if (to_bo_gem(bo[i])->has_error)
3126 {
3127 ret = -ENOMEM;
3128 goto skip_execution;
3129 }
3130
3131 /* Update indices and set up the validate list. */
3132 mos_gem_bo_process_reloc2(bo[i]);
3133
3134 /* Add the batch buffer to the validation list. There are no relocations
3135 * pointing to it.
3136 */
3137 mos_add_validate_buffer2(bo[i], 0);
3138
3139 if((bufmgr_gem->exec_count - 1 + num_bo) > exec_info.obj_remain_size)
3140 {
3141 // origin size + OBJ512_SIZE + obj_count + batch_count;
3142 uint32_t new_obj_size = exec_info.obj_count + exec_info.obj_remain_size + OBJ512_SIZE + bufmgr_gem->exec_count - 1 + num_bo;
3143 struct drm_i915_gem_exec_object2 *new_obj = (struct drm_i915_gem_exec_object2 *)realloc(exec_info.obj, new_obj_size * sizeof(struct drm_i915_gem_exec_object2));
3144 if(new_obj == nullptr)
3145 {
3146 ret = -ENOMEM;
3147 goto skip_execution;
3148 }
3149 exec_info.obj_remain_size = new_obj_size - exec_info.obj_count;
3150 exec_info.obj = new_obj;
3151 }
3152 if(0 == i)
3153 {
3154 uint32_t cp_size = (bufmgr_gem->exec_count - 1) * sizeof(struct drm_i915_gem_exec_object2);
3155 memcpy(exec_info.obj, bufmgr_gem->exec2_objects, cp_size);
3156 exec_info.obj_count += (bufmgr_gem->exec_count - 1);
3157 exec_info.obj_remain_size -= (bufmgr_gem->exec_count - 1);
3158 }
3159 else
3160 {
3161 for(int e2 = 0; e2 < bufmgr_gem->exec_count - 1; e2++)
3162 {
3163 int e1;
3164 for(e1 = 0; e1 < exec_info.obj_count; e1++)
3165 {
3166 // skip the duplicated bo if it is already in the list of exec_info.obj
3167 if(bufmgr_gem->exec2_objects[e2].handle == exec_info.obj[e1].handle)
3168 {
3169 break;
3170 }
3171 }
3172 //if no duplicated bo found, add it into list of exec_info.obj
3173 if(e1 == exec_info.obj_count)
3174 {
3175 exec_info.obj[exec_info.obj_count] = bufmgr_gem->exec2_objects[e2];
3176 exec_info.obj_count++;
3177 exec_info.obj_remain_size--;
3178 }
3179 }
3180 }
3181 memcpy(&exec_info.batch_obj[i], &bufmgr_gem->exec2_objects[bufmgr_gem->exec_count - 1], sizeof(struct drm_i915_gem_exec_object2));
3182 exec_info.batch_count++;
3183 uint32_t reloc_count = bufmgr_gem->exec2_objects[bufmgr_gem->exec_count - 1].relocation_count;
3184 uint32_t cp_size = (reloc_count * sizeof(struct drm_i915_gem_relocation_entry));
3185
3186 struct drm_i915_gem_relocation_entry* ptr_reloc = (struct drm_i915_gem_relocation_entry *)calloc(reloc_count,sizeof(struct drm_i915_gem_relocation_entry));
3187 if(ptr_reloc == nullptr)
3188 {
3189 ret = -ENOMEM;
3190 goto skip_execution;
3191 }
3192 memcpy(ptr_reloc, (struct drm_i915_gem_relocation_entry *)bufmgr_gem->exec2_objects[bufmgr_gem->exec_count - 1].relocs_ptr, cp_size);
3193
3194 exec_info.batch_obj[i].relocs_ptr = (uintptr_t)ptr_reloc;
3195 exec_info.batch_obj[i].relocation_count = reloc_count;
3196
3197 //clear bo
3198 if (bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.debug)
3199 {
3200 mos_gem_dump_validation_list(bufmgr_gem);
3201 }
3202
3203 for (int j = 0; j < bufmgr_gem->exec_count; j++) {
3204 struct mos_bo_gem *bo_gem = to_bo_gem(bufmgr_gem->exec_bos[j]);
3205
3206 if(bo_gem)
3207 {
3208 bo_gem->idle = false;
3209
3210 /* Disconnect the buffer from the validate list */
3211 bo_gem->validate_index = -1;
3212 bufmgr_gem->exec_bos[j] = nullptr;
3213 }
3214 }
3215 bufmgr_gem->exec_count = 0;
3216 }
3217
3218 //add back batch obj to the last position
3219 for(i = 0; i < num_bo; i++)
3220 {
3221 exec_info.obj[exec_info.obj_count] = exec_info.batch_obj[i];
3222 exec_info.obj_count++;
3223 exec_info.obj_remain_size--;
3224 }
3225
3226 //save previous ptr
3227 exec_info.pSavePreviousExec2Objects = bufmgr_gem->exec2_objects;
3228 bufmgr_gem->exec_count = exec_info.obj_count;
3229 bufmgr_gem->exec2_objects = exec_info.obj;
3230
3231 memclear(execbuf);
3232 execbuf.buffers_ptr = (uintptr_t)bufmgr_gem->exec2_objects;
3233 execbuf.buffer_count = bufmgr_gem->exec_count;
3234 execbuf.batch_start_offset = 0;
3235 execbuf.cliprects_ptr = (uintptr_t)cliprects;
3236 execbuf.num_cliprects = num_cliprects;
3237 execbuf.DR1 = 0;
3238 execbuf.DR4 = DR4;
3239 execbuf.flags = flags;
3240 if (ctx == nullptr)
3241 i915_execbuffer2_set_context_id(execbuf, 0);
3242 else
3243 i915_execbuffer2_set_context_id(execbuf, ctx->ctx_id);
3244 execbuf.rsvd2 = 0;
3245 if((flags & I915_EXEC_FENCE_SUBMIT) || (flags & I915_EXEC_FENCE_IN))
3246 {
3247 execbuf.rsvd2 = *fence;
3248 }
3249 else if(flags & I915_EXEC_FENCE_OUT)
3250 {
3251 execbuf.rsvd2 = -1;
3252 }
3253
3254 if (bufmgr_gem->no_exec)
3255 goto skip_execution;
3256
3257 ret = drmIoctl(bufmgr_gem->fd,
3258 DRM_IOCTL_I915_GEM_EXECBUFFER2_WR,
3259 &execbuf);
3260
3261 if (ret != 0) {
3262 ret = -errno;
3263 if (ret == -ENOSPC) {
3264 MOS_DBG("Execbuffer fails to pin. "
3265 "Estimate: %u. Actual: %u. Available: %u\n",
3266 mos_gem_estimate_batch_space(bufmgr_gem->exec_bos,
3267 bufmgr_gem->exec_count),
3268 mos_gem_compute_batch_space(bufmgr_gem->exec_bos,
3269 bufmgr_gem->exec_count),
3270 (unsigned int) bufmgr_gem->gtt_size);
3271 }
3272 }
3273
3274 bufmgr_gem->exec2_objects = exec_info.pSavePreviousExec2Objects;
3275
3276 if(flags & I915_EXEC_FENCE_OUT)
3277 {
3278 *fence = execbuf.rsvd2 >> 32;
3279 }
3280
3281skip_execution:
3282 if (bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.debug)
3283 mos_gem_dump_validation_list(bufmgr_gem);
3284
3285 bufmgr_gem->exec_count = 0;
3286 if(exec_info.batch_obj)
3287 {
3288 for(i = 0; i < num_bo; i++)
3289 {
3290 mos_safe_free((struct drm_i915_gem_relocation_entry *)exec_info.batch_obj[i].relocs_ptr);
3291 }
3292 }
3293 mos_safe_free(exec_info.obj);
3294 mos_safe_free(exec_info.batch_obj);
3295 pthread_mutex_unlock(&bufmgr_gem->lock);
3296
3297 return ret;
3298}

3335
3336static int
3337mos_gem_bo_check_mem_region_internal(struct mos_linux_bo *bo,
3338 int mem_type)
3339{
3340 struct mos_bo_gem *bo_gem = (struct mos_bo_gem *) bo;
3341 struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem = (struct mos_bufmgr_gem *) bo->bufmgr;
3342
3343 if (BufmgrPrelim::IsPrelimSupported()) {
3344 return bufmgr_gem->prelim->CheckMemRegion(bo_gem->mem_region, mem_type);
3345 }
3346
3347 // when re-cycle the gem_bo, need to keep the VA space is keeping consistent on memory type
3348 if (bo_gem->mem_region == I915_MEMORY_CLASS_SYSTEM &&
3349 (mem_type == MOS_MEMPOOL_VIDEOMEMORY || mem_type == MOS_MEMPOOL_DEVICEMEMORY))
3350 return -EINVAL;
3351
3352 if (bo_gem->mem_region == I915_MEMORY_CLASS_DEVICE &&
3353 (mem_type == MOS_MEMPOOL_SYSTEMMEMORY))
3354 return -EINVAL;
3355
3356 return 0;
3357}
3358
3359static int
3360mos_gem_bo_set_tiling_internal(struct mos_linux_bo *bo,
3361 uint32_t tiling_mode,
3362 uint32_t stride)
3363{
3364 struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem = (struct mos_bufmgr_gem *) bo->bufmgr;
3365 struct mos_bo_gem *bo_gem = (struct mos_bo_gem *) bo;
3366 struct drm_i915_gem_set_tiling set_tiling;
3367 int ret;
3368
3369 if (!bufmgr_gem->has_fence_reg)
3370 return 0;
3371
3372 if (bo_gem->global_name == 0 &&
3373 tiling_mode == bo_gem->tiling_mode &&
3374 stride == bo_gem->stride)
3375 return 0;
3376
3377 memset(&set_tiling, 0, sizeof(set_tiling));
3378 /* set_tiling is slightly broken and overwrites the
3379 * input on the error path, so we have to open code
3380 * rmIoctl.
3381 */
3382 set_tiling.handle = bo_gem->gem_handle;
3383 set_tiling.tiling_mode = tiling_mode;
3384 set_tiling.stride = stride;
3385
3386 ret = drmIoctl(bufmgr_gem->fd,
3387 DRM_IOCTL_I915_GEM_SET_TILING,
3388 &set_tiling);
3389 if (ret == -1)
3390 return -errno;
3391
3392 bo_gem->tiling_mode = set_tiling.tiling_mode;
3393 bo_gem->swizzle_mode = set_tiling.swizzle_mode;
3394 bo_gem->stride = set_tiling.stride;
3395 return 0;
3396}
3397
3398static int
3399mos_gem_bo_set_tiling(struct mos_linux_bo *bo, uint32_t * tiling_mode,
3400 uint32_t stride)
3401{
3402 struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem = (struct mos_bufmgr_gem *) bo->bufmgr;
3403 struct mos_bo_gem *bo_gem = (struct mos_bo_gem *) bo;
3404 int ret;
3405
3406 /* Tiling with userptr surfaces is not supported
3407 * on all hardware so refuse it for time being.
3408 */
3409 if (bo_gem->is_userptr)
3410 return -EINVAL;
3411
3412 /* Linear buffers have no stride. By ensuring that we only ever use
3413 * stride 0 with linear buffers, we simplify our code.
3414 */
3415 if (*tiling_mode == I915_TILING_NONE)
3416 stride = 0;
3417
3418 ret = mos_gem_bo_set_tiling_internal(bo, *tiling_mode, stride);
3419 if (ret == 0)
3420 mos_bo_gem_set_in_aperture_size(bufmgr_gem, bo_gem, 0);
3421 *tiling_mode = bo_gem->tiling_mode;
3422 return ret;
3423}
3424
3425static int
3426mos_gem_bo_get_tiling(struct mos_linux_bo *bo, uint32_t * tiling_mode,
3427 uint32_t * swizzle_mode)
3428{
3429 struct mos_bo_gem *bo_gem = (struct mos_bo_gem *) bo;
3430
3431 *tiling_mode = bo_gem->tiling_mode;
3432 *swizzle_mode = bo_gem->swizzle_mode;
3433 return 0;
3434}
3435
3436static int
3437mos_gem_bo_set_softpin_offset(struct mos_linux_bo *bo, uint64_t offset)
3438{
3439 struct mos_bo_gem *bo_gem = (struct mos_bo_gem *) bo;
3440
3441 bo_gem->is_softpin = true;
3442 bo->offset64 = offset;
3443 bo->offset = offset;
3444 return 0;
3445}
3446
3447static int
3448mos_gem_bo_set_softpin(MOS_LINUX_BO *bo)
3449{
3450 int ret = 0;
3451 struct mos_bo_gem *bo_gem = (struct mos_bo_gem *) bo;
3452 struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem = (struct mos_bufmgr_gem *) bo->bufmgr;
3453
3454 pthread_mutex_lock(&bufmgr_gem->lock);
3455 if (!mos_gem_bo_is_softpin(bo))
3456 {
3457 uint64_t offset = 0;
3458 if (BufmgrPrelim::IsPrelimSupported() && bo_gem->mem_region == MEMZONE_PRIME) {
3459 offset = mos_gem_bo_vma_alloc(bo->bufmgr, (enum mos_memory_zone)bo_gem->mem_region, bo->size, PAGE_SIZE_2M);
3460 } else {
3461 uint64_t alignment = (bufmgr_gem->softpin_va1Malign) ? PAGE_SIZE_1M : PAGE_SIZE_64K;
3462 offset = mos_gem_bo_vma_alloc(bo->bufmgr, (enum mos_memory_zone)bo_gem->mem_region, bo->size, alignment);
3463 }
3464 ret = mos_gem_bo_set_softpin_offset(bo, offset);
3465 }
3466 pthread_mutex_unlock(&bufmgr_gem->lock);
3467
3468 if (ret == 0)
3469 {
3470 ret = mos_bo_use_48b_address_range(bo, 1);
3471 }
3472
3473 return ret;
3474}
3475
3476static struct mos_linux_bo *
3477mos_gem_bo_create_from_prime(struct mos_bufmgr *bufmgr, int prime_fd, int size)
3478{
3479 struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem = (struct mos_bufmgr_gem *) bufmgr;
3480 int ret;
3481 uint32_t handle;
3482 struct mos_bo_gem *bo_gem;
3483 struct drm_i915_gem_get_tiling get_tiling;
3484 drmMMListHead *list;
3485
3486 pthread_mutex_lock(&bufmgr_gem->lock);
3487 ret = drmPrimeFDToHandle(bufmgr_gem->fd, prime_fd, &handle);
3488 if (ret) {
3489 MOS_DBG("create_from_prime: failed to obtain handle from fd: %s\n", strerror(errno));
3490 pthread_mutex_unlock(&bufmgr_gem->lock);
3491 return nullptr;
3492 }
3493
3494 /*
3495 * See if the kernel has already returned this buffer to us. Just as
3496 * for named buffers, we must not create two bo's pointing at the same
3497 * kernel object
3498 */
3499 for (list = bufmgr_gem->named.next;
3500 list != &bufmgr_gem->named;
3501 list = list->next) {
3502 bo_gem = DRMLISTENTRY(struct mos_bo_gem, list, name_list);
3503 if (bo_gem->gem_handle == handle) {
3504 mos_gem_bo_reference(&bo_gem->bo);
3505 pthread_mutex_unlock(&bufmgr_gem->lock);
3506 return &bo_gem->bo;
3507 }
3508 }
3509
3510 bo_gem = (struct mos_bo_gem *)calloc(1, sizeof(*bo_gem));
3511 if (!bo_gem) {
3512 pthread_mutex_unlock(&bufmgr_gem->lock);
3513 return nullptr;
3514 }
3515 /* Determine size of bo. The fd-to-handle ioctl really should
3516 * return the size, but it doesn't. If we have kernel 3.12 or
3517 * later, we can lseek on the prime fd to get the size. Older
3518 * kernels will just fail, in which case we fall back to the
3519 * provided (estimated or guess size). */
3520 ret = lseek(prime_fd, 0, SEEK_END);
3521 if (ret != -1)
3522 bo_gem->bo.size = ret;
3523 else
3524 bo_gem->bo.size = size;
3525
3526 bo_gem->bo.handle = handle;
3527 bo_gem->bo.bufmgr = bufmgr;
3528
3529 bo_gem->gem_handle = handle;
3530
3531 atomic_set(&bo_gem->refcount, 1);
3532
3533 bo_gem->name = "prime";
3534 bo_gem->validate_index = -1;
3535 bo_gem->reloc_tree_fences = 0;
3536 bo_gem->used_as_reloc_target = false;
3537 bo_gem->has_error = false;
3538 bo_gem->reusable = false;
3539 bo_gem->use_48b_address_range = bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_use_48b_address_range ? true : false;
3540 if (BufmgrPrelim::IsPrelimSupported()) {
3541 bo_gem->mem_region = MEMZONE_PRIME;
3542 }
3543
3544 DRMLISTADDTAIL(&bo_gem->name_list, &bufmgr_gem->named);
3545 pthread_mutex_unlock(&bufmgr_gem->lock);
3546
3547 memclear(get_tiling);
3548 if(bufmgr_gem->has_fence_reg) {
3549 get_tiling.handle = bo_gem->gem_handle;
3550 ret = drmIoctl(bufmgr_gem->fd,
3551 DRM_IOCTL_I915_GEM_GET_TILING,
3552 &get_tiling);
3553 if (ret != 0) {
3554 MOS_DBG("create_from_prime: failed to get tiling: %s\n", strerror(errno));
3555 mos_gem_bo_unreference(&bo_gem->bo);
3556 return nullptr;
3557 }
3558 }
3559 bo_gem->tiling_mode = get_tiling.tiling_mode;
3560 bo_gem->swizzle_mode = get_tiling.swizzle_mode;
3561 /* XXX stride is unknown */
3562 mos_bo_gem_set_in_aperture_size(bufmgr_gem, bo_gem, 0);
3563 if (bufmgr_gem->use_softpin)
3564 {
3565 mos_bo_set_softpin(&bo_gem->bo);
3566 }
3567
3568 return &bo_gem->bo;
3569}
3570
3571static int
3572mos_gem_bo_export_to_prime(struct mos_linux_bo *bo, int *prime_fd)
3573{
3574 struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem = (struct mos_bufmgr_gem *) bo->bufmgr;
3575 struct mos_bo_gem *bo_gem = (struct mos_bo_gem *) bo;
3576
3577 pthread_mutex_lock(&bufmgr_gem->lock);
3578 if (DRMLISTEMPTY(&bo_gem->name_list))
3579 DRMLISTADDTAIL(&bo_gem->name_list, &bufmgr_gem->named);
3580 pthread_mutex_unlock(&bufmgr_gem->lock);
3581
3582 if (drmPrimeHandleToFD(bufmgr_gem->fd, bo_gem->gem_handle,
3583 DRM_CLOEXEC, prime_fd) != 0)
3584 return -errno;
3585
3586 bo_gem->reusable = false;
3587
3588 return 0;
3589}
3590
3591static int
3592mos_gem_bo_flink(struct mos_linux_bo *bo, uint32_t * name)
3593{
3594 struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem = (struct mos_bufmgr_gem *) bo->bufmgr;
3595 struct mos_bo_gem *bo_gem = (struct mos_bo_gem *) bo;
3596 int ret;
3597
3598 if (!bo_gem->global_name) {
3599 struct drm_gem_flink flink;
3600
3601 memclear(flink);
3602 flink.handle = bo_gem->gem_handle;
3603
3604 pthread_mutex_lock(&bufmgr_gem->lock);
3605
3606 ret = drmIoctl(bufmgr_gem->fd, DRM_IOCTL_GEM_FLINK, &flink);
3607 if (ret != 0) {
3608 pthread_mutex_unlock(&bufmgr_gem->lock);
3609 return -errno;
3610 }
3611
3612 bo_gem->global_name = flink.name;
3613 bo_gem->reusable = false;
3614
3615 if (DRMLISTEMPTY(&bo_gem->name_list))
3616 DRMLISTADDTAIL(&bo_gem->name_list, &bufmgr_gem->named);
3617 pthread_mutex_unlock(&bufmgr_gem->lock);
3618 }
3619
3620 *name = bo_gem->global_name;
3621 return 0;
3622}

3643static int
3644mos_gem_bo_get_aperture_space(struct mos_linux_bo *bo)
3645{
3646 struct mos_bo_gem *bo_gem = (struct mos_bo_gem *) bo;
3647 int i;
3648 int total = 0;
3649
3650 if (bo == nullptr || bo_gem->included_in_check_aperture)
3651 return 0;
3652
3653 total += bo->size;
3654 bo_gem->included_in_check_aperture = true;
3655
3656 for (i = 0; i < bo_gem->reloc_count; i++)
3657 total +=
3658 mos_gem_bo_get_aperture_space(bo_gem->
3659 reloc_target_info[i].bo);
3660
3661 return total;
3662}
3663
3672static unsigned int
3673mos_gem_total_fences(struct mos_linux_bo ** bo_array, int count)
3674{
3675 int i;
3676 unsigned int total = 0;
3677
3678 for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
3679 struct mos_bo_gem *bo_gem = (struct mos_bo_gem *) bo_array[i];
3680
3681 if (bo_gem == nullptr)
3682 continue;
3683
3684 total += bo_gem->reloc_tree_fences;
3685 }
3686 return total;
3687}
3688
3693static void
3694mos_gem_bo_clear_aperture_space_flag(struct mos_linux_bo *bo)
3695{
3696 struct mos_bo_gem *bo_gem = (struct mos_bo_gem *) bo;
3697 int i;
3698
3699 if (bo == nullptr || !bo_gem->included_in_check_aperture)
3700 return;
3701
3702 bo_gem->included_in_check_aperture = false;
3703
3704 for (i = 0; i < bo_gem->reloc_count; i++)
3705 mos_gem_bo_clear_aperture_space_flag(bo_gem->
3706 reloc_target_info[i].bo);
3707}
3708
3713static unsigned int
3714mos_gem_estimate_batch_space(struct mos_linux_bo **bo_array, int count)
3715{
3716 int i;
3717 unsigned int total = 0;
3718
3719 for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
3720 struct mos_bo_gem *bo_gem = (struct mos_bo_gem *) bo_array[i];
3721 if (bo_gem != nullptr)
3722 total += bo_gem->reloc_tree_size;
3723 }
3724 return total;
3725}
3726
3732static unsigned int
3733mos_gem_compute_batch_space(struct mos_linux_bo **bo_array, int count)
3734{
3735 int i;
3736 unsigned int total = 0;
3737
3738 for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
3739 total += mos_gem_bo_get_aperture_space(bo_array[i]);
3740 /* For the first buffer object in the array, we get an
3741 * accurate count back for its reloc_tree size (since nothing
3742 * had been flagged as being counted yet). We can save that
3743 * value out as a more conservative reloc_tree_size that
3744 * avoids double-counting target buffers. Since the first
3745 * buffer happens to usually be the batch buffer in our
3746 * callers, this can pull us back from doing the tree
3747 * walk on every new batch emit.
3748 */
3749 if (i == 0) {
3750 struct mos_bo_gem *bo_gem =
3751 (struct mos_bo_gem *) bo_array[i];
3752 bo_gem->reloc_tree_size = total;
3753 }
3754 }
3755
3756 for (i = 0; i < count; i++)
3757 mos_gem_bo_clear_aperture_space_flag(bo_array[i]);
3758 return total;
3759}
3760
3777static int
3778mos_gem_check_aperture_space(struct mos_linux_bo **bo_array, int count)
3779{
3780 struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem =
3781 (struct mos_bufmgr_gem *) bo_array[0]->bufmgr;
3782 unsigned int total = 0;
3783 unsigned int threshold = bufmgr_gem->gtt_size * 3 / 4;
3784 int total_fences;
3785
3786 /* Check for fence reg constraints if necessary */
3787 if (bufmgr_gem->available_fences) {
3788 total_fences = mos_gem_total_fences(bo_array, count);
3789 if (total_fences > bufmgr_gem->available_fences)
3790 return -ENOSPC;
3791 }
3792
3793 total = mos_gem_estimate_batch_space(bo_array, count);
3794
3795 if (total > threshold)
3796 total = mos_gem_compute_batch_space(bo_array, count);
3797
3798 if (total > threshold) {
3799 MOS_DBG("check_space: overflowed available aperture, "
3800 "%dkb vs %dkb\n",
3801 total / 1024, (int)bufmgr_gem->gtt_size / 1024);
3802 return -ENOSPC;
3803 } else {
3804 MOS_DBG("drm_check_space: total %dkb vs bufgr %dkb\n", total / 1024,
3805 (int)bufmgr_gem->gtt_size / 1024);
3806 return 0;
3807 }
3808}

3824mos_gem_bo_is_reusable(struct mos_linux_bo *bo)

3830
3831static int
3832_mos_gem_bo_references(struct mos_linux_bo *bo, struct mos_linux_bo *target_bo)
3833{
3834 struct mos_bo_gem *bo_gem = (struct mos_bo_gem *) bo;
3835 int i;
3836
3837 for (i = 0; i < bo_gem->reloc_count; i++) {
3838 if (bo_gem->reloc_target_info[i].bo == target_bo)
3839 return 1;
3840 if (bo == bo_gem->reloc_target_info[i].bo)
3841 continue;
3842 if (_mos_gem_bo_references(bo_gem->reloc_target_info[i].bo,
3843 target_bo))
3844 return 1;
3845 }
3846
3847 for (i = 0; i< bo_gem->softpin_target_count; i++) {
3848 if (bo_gem->softpin_target[i].bo == target_bo)
3849 return 1;
3850 if (_mos_gem_bo_references(bo_gem->softpin_target[i].bo, target_bo))
3851 return 1;
3852 }
3853
3854 return 0;
3855}
3856
3858static int
3859mos_gem_bo_references(struct mos_linux_bo *bo, struct mos_linux_bo *target_bo)
3860{
3861 struct mos_bo_gem *target_bo_gem = (struct mos_bo_gem *) target_bo;
3862
3863 if (bo == nullptr || target_bo == nullptr)
3864 return 0;
3865 if (target_bo_gem->used_as_reloc_target)
3866 return _mos_gem_bo_references(bo, target_bo);
3867 return 0;
3868}
3869
3870static void
3871add_bucket(struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem, int size)
3872{
3873 unsigned int i = bufmgr_gem->num_buckets;
3874
3875 assert(i < ARRAY_SIZE(bufmgr_gem->cache_bucket));
3876
3877 DRMINITLISTHEAD(&bufmgr_gem->cache_bucket[i].head);
3878 bufmgr_gem->cache_bucket[i].size = size;
3879 bufmgr_gem->num_buckets++;
3880}
3881
3882static void
3883init_cache_buckets(struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem)
3884{
3885 unsigned long size, cache_max_size = 64 * 1024 * 1024;
3886
3887 /* OK, so power of two buckets was too wasteful of memory.
3888 * Give 3 other sizes between each power of two, to hopefully
3889 * cover things accurately enough. (The alternative is
3890 * probably to just go for exact matching of sizes, and assume
3891 * that for things like composited window resize the tiled
3892 * width/height alignment and rounding of sizes to pages will
3893 * get us useful cache hit rates anyway)
3894 */
3895 add_bucket(bufmgr_gem, 4096);
3896 add_bucket(bufmgr_gem, 4096 * 2);
3897 add_bucket(bufmgr_gem, 4096 * 3);
3898
3899 /* Initialize the linked lists for BO reuse cache. */
3900 for (size = 4 * 4096; size <= cache_max_size; size *= 2) {
3901 add_bucket(bufmgr_gem, size);
3902
3903 add_bucket(bufmgr_gem, size + size * 1 / 4);
3904 add_bucket(bufmgr_gem, size + size * 2 / 4);
3905 add_bucket(bufmgr_gem, size + size * 3 / 4);
3906 }
3907}
3908
3913static int
3914get_pci_device_id(struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem)
3915{
3916 char *devid_override;
3917 int devid = 0;
3918 int ret;
3919 drm_i915_getparam_t gp;
3920
3921 if (geteuid() == getuid()) {
3922 devid_override = getenv("INTEL_DEVID_OVERRIDE");
3923 if (devid_override) {
3924 bufmgr_gem->no_exec = true;
3925 return strtod(devid_override, nullptr);
3926 }
3927 }
3928
3929 memclear(gp);
3930 gp.param = I915_PARAM_CHIPSET_ID;
3931 gp.value = &devid;
3932 ret = drmIoctl(bufmgr_gem->fd, DRM_IOCTL_I915_GETPARAM, &gp);
3933 if (ret) {
3934 fprintf(stderr, "get chip id failed: %d [%d]\n", ret, errno);
3935 fprintf(stderr, "param: %d, val: %d\n", gp.param, *gp.value);
3936 }
3937 return devid;
3938}
3939
3940static int
3941mos_gem_get_devid(struct mos_bufmgr *bufmgr)
3942{
3943 struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem = (struct mos_bufmgr_gem *)bufmgr;
3944
3945 return bufmgr_gem->pci_device;
3946}
3947
3948int mos_gem_ctx_set_user_ctx_params(struct mos_linux_context *context)
3949{
3950 /*
3951 * INTEL_I915_CTX_CONTROL=0, 1, 2, 3
3952 * 0: default, do nothing
3953 * 1: disable ctx recoverable
3954 * 2: disable ctx bannable
3955 * 3: disable both
3956 * */
3957
3958 if (context == nullptr)
3959 {
3960 return -EINVAL;
3961 }
3962
3963 int ret = 0;
3964 char *user_ctx_env = getenv("INTEL_I915_CTX_CONTROL");
3965 bool disable_recoverable = false;
3966 bool disable_bannable = false;
3967 struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem = (struct mos_bufmgr_gem *)context->bufmgr;
3968
3969 if (user_ctx_env != nullptr)
3970 {
3971 uint8_t user_ctx_env_value = (uint8_t)atoi(user_ctx_env);
3972 if(user_ctx_env_value > 3)
3973 {
3974 MOS_DBG("INTEL_I915_CTX_CONTROL: invalid value %u setting\n",
3975 user_ctx_env_value);
3976 }
3977 else
3978 {
3979 if (user_ctx_env_value & 0x1)
3980 {
3981 disable_recoverable = true;
3982 }
3983
3984 if(user_ctx_env_value & 0x2)
3985 {
3986 disable_bannable = true;
3987 }
3988 }
3989 }
3990
3991 if(disable_recoverable)
3992 {
3993 ret = mos_set_context_param(context,
3994 0,
3995 I915_CONTEXT_PARAM_RECOVERABLE,
3996 0);
3997 if(ret != 0) {
3998 MOS_DBG("I915_CONTEXT_PARAM_RECOVERABLE failed: %s\n",
3999 strerror(errno));
4000 }
4001 else
4002 {
4003 MOS_DBG("successfull to disable context recoverable\n");
4004 }
4005 }
4006
4007 if(disable_bannable)
4008 {
4009 ret = mos_set_context_param(context,
4010 0,
4011 I915_CONTEXT_PARAM_BANNABLE,
4012 0);
4013 if(ret != 0) {
4014 MOS_DBG("I915_CONTEXT_PARAM_BANNABLE failed: %s\n",
4015 strerror(errno));
4016 }
4017 else
4018 {
4019 MOS_DBG("successfull to disable context bannable\n");
4020 }
4021 }
4022
4023 return ret;
4024}

4026static struct mos_linux_context *
4027mos_gem_context_create(struct mos_bufmgr *bufmgr)
4028{
4029 struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem = (struct mos_bufmgr_gem *)bufmgr;
4030 struct drm_i915_gem_context_create create;
4031 struct mos_linux_context *context = nullptr;
4032 int ret;
4033
4034 context = (struct mos_linux_context *)calloc(1, sizeof(*context));
4035 if (!context)
4036 return nullptr;
4037
4038 memclear(create);
4039 ret = drmIoctl(bufmgr_gem->fd, DRM_IOCTL_I915_GEM_CONTEXT_CREATE, &create);
4040 if (ret != 0) {
4041 MOS_DBG("DRM_IOCTL_I915_GEM_CONTEXT_CREATE failed: %s\n",
4042 strerror(errno));
4043 free(context);
4044 return nullptr;
4045 }
4046
4047 context->ctx_id = create.ctx_id;
4048 context->bufmgr = bufmgr;
4049
4050 ret = mos_gem_ctx_set_user_ctx_params(context);
4051
4052 return context;
4053}

4111
4112static unsigned int mos_bufmgr_hweight8(struct mos_linux_context *ctx, uint8_t w)
4113{
4114 uint32_t i, weight = 0;
4115
4116 for (i=0; i<8; i++)
4117 {
4118 weight += !!((w) & (1UL << i));
4119 }
4120 return weight;
4121}
4122
4123static uint8_t mos_bufmgr_switch_off_n_bits(struct mos_linux_context *ctx, uint8_t in_mask, int n)
4124{
4125 int i,count;
4126 uint8_t bi,out_mask;
4127
4128 assert (n>0 && n<=8);
4129
4130 out_mask = in_mask;
4131 count = n;
4132 for(i=0; i<8; i++)
4133 {
4134 bi = 1UL<<i;
4135 if (bi & in_mask)
4136 {
4137 out_mask &= ~bi;
4138 count--;
4139 }
4140 if (count==0)
4141 {
4142 break;
4143 }
4144 }
4145 return out_mask;
4146}

4268
4269static pthread_mutex_t bufmgr_list_mutex = PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;
4270static drmMMListHead bufmgr_list = { &bufmgr_list, &bufmgr_list };
4271
4272static struct mos_bufmgr_gem *
4273mos_bufmgr_gem_find(int fd)
4274{
4275 struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem;
4276
4277 DRMLISTFOREACHENTRY(bufmgr_gem, &bufmgr_list, managers) {
4278 if (bufmgr_gem->fd == fd) {
4279 atomic_inc(&bufmgr_gem->refcount);
4280 return bufmgr_gem;
4281 }
4282 }
4283
4284 return nullptr;
4285}
4286
4287static void
4288mos_bufmgr_gem_unref(struct mos_bufmgr *bufmgr)
4289{
4290 struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem = (struct mos_bufmgr_gem *)bufmgr;
4291
4292 if (atomic_add_unless(&bufmgr_gem->refcount, -1, 1)) {
4293 pthread_mutex_lock(&bufmgr_list_mutex);
4294
4295 if (atomic_dec_and_test(&bufmgr_gem->refcount)) {
4296 DRMLISTDEL(&bufmgr_gem->managers);
4297 mos_bufmgr_gem_destroy(bufmgr);
4298 }
4299
4300 pthread_mutex_unlock(&bufmgr_list_mutex);
4301 }
4302}

4344static struct mos_linux_context *
4345mos_gem_context_create_ext(struct mos_bufmgr *bufmgr, __u32 flags, bool bContextProtected)
4346{
4347 struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem = (struct mos_bufmgr_gem *)bufmgr;
4348 struct drm_i915_gem_context_create_ext create;
4349 struct mos_linux_context *context = nullptr;
4350 struct drm_i915_gem_context_create_ext_setparam p_protected;
4351 struct drm_i915_gem_context_create_ext_setparam p_norecover;
4352 int ret;
4353
4354 context = (struct mos_linux_context *)calloc(1, sizeof(*context));
4355 if (!context)
4356 return nullptr;
4357
4358 memclear(create);
4359 create.flags = flags;
4360 create.extensions = 0;
4361
4362 if (bContextProtected)
4363 {
4364 memclear(p_protected);
4365 memclear(p_norecover);
4366 p_protected.base.next_extension = 0;
4367 p_protected.base.name = I915_CONTEXT_CREATE_EXT_SETPARAM;
4368 p_protected.param.param = I915_CONTEXT_PARAM_PROTECTED_CONTENT;
4369 p_protected.param.value = 1;
4370
4371 p_norecover.base.next_extension = (uintptr_t)&p_protected;
4372 p_norecover.base.name = I915_CONTEXT_CREATE_EXT_SETPARAM;
4373 p_norecover.param.param = I915_CONTEXT_PARAM_RECOVERABLE;
4374 p_norecover.param.value = 0;
4375
4376 create.flags = flags|I915_CONTEXT_CREATE_FLAGS_USE_EXTENSIONS;
4377 create.extensions = (uintptr_t)&p_norecover;
4378 }
4379
4380 ret = drmIoctl(bufmgr_gem->fd, DRM_IOCTL_I915_GEM_CONTEXT_CREATE_EXT, &create);
4381 if (ret != 0) {
4382 MOS_DBG("DRM_IOCTL_I915_GEM_CONTEXT_CREATE failed: %s\n",
4383 strerror(errno));
4384 free(context);
4385 return nullptr;
4386 }
4387
4388 context->ctx_id = create.ctx_id;
4389 context->bufmgr = bufmgr;
4390
4391 ret = mos_gem_ctx_set_user_ctx_params(context);
4392
4393 return context;
4394}

4456
4457static struct mos_linux_context *
4458mos_gem_context_create_shared(struct mos_bufmgr *bufmgr,
4459 mos_linux_context* ctx,
4460 __u32 flags,
4461 bool bContextProtected,
4462 void *engine_map,
4463 uint8_t ctx_width,
4464 uint8_t num_placements,
4465 uint32_t ctx_type)
4466{
4467 MOS_UNUSED(engine_map);
4468 MOS_UNUSED(ctx_width);
4469 MOS_UNUSED(num_placements);
4470 MOS_UNUSED(ctx_type);
4471
4472 struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem = (struct mos_bufmgr_gem *)bufmgr;
4473 struct drm_i915_gem_context_create_ext create;
4474 struct mos_linux_context *context = nullptr;
4475 struct drm_i915_gem_context_create_ext_setparam p_protected;
4476 struct drm_i915_gem_context_create_ext_setparam p_norecover;
4477 int ret;
4478
4479 if (ctx == nullptr || ctx->vm_id == INVALID_VM)
4480 return nullptr;
4481
4482 if (BufmgrPrelim::IsPrelimSupported()) {
4483 bufmgr_gem->prelim->WaDisableSingleTimeline(bufmgr_gem->has_lmem, flags);
4484 }
4485
4486 context = (struct mos_linux_context *)calloc(1, sizeof(*context));
4487 if (!context)
4488 return nullptr;
4489
4490 memclear(create);
4491 create.flags = flags;
4492 create.extensions = 0;
4493 if (bContextProtected)
4494 {
4495 memclear(p_protected);
4496 memclear(p_norecover);
4497 p_protected.base.next_extension = 0;
4498 p_protected.base.name = I915_CONTEXT_CREATE_EXT_SETPARAM;
4499 p_protected.param.param = I915_CONTEXT_PARAM_PROTECTED_CONTENT;
4500 p_protected.param.value = 1;
4501
4502 p_norecover.base.next_extension = (uintptr_t)&p_protected;
4503 p_norecover.base.name = I915_CONTEXT_CREATE_EXT_SETPARAM;
4504 p_norecover.param.param = I915_CONTEXT_PARAM_RECOVERABLE;
4505 p_norecover.param.value = 0;
4506
4507 create.flags = flags|I915_CONTEXT_CREATE_FLAGS_USE_EXTENSIONS;
4508 create.extensions = (uintptr_t)&p_norecover;
4509 }
4510 ret = drmIoctl(bufmgr_gem->fd, DRM_IOCTL_I915_GEM_CONTEXT_CREATE_EXT, &create);
4511 if (ret != 0) {
4512 MOS_DBG("DRM_IOCTL_I915_GEM_CONTEXT_CREATE failed: %s\n",
4513 strerror(errno));
4514 free(context);
4515 return nullptr;
4516 }
4517
4518 context->ctx_id = create.ctx_id;
4519 context->bufmgr = bufmgr;
4520
4521 ret = mos_set_context_param(context,
4522 0,
4523 I915_CONTEXT_PARAM_VM,
4524 ctx->vm_id);
4525 if(ret != 0) {
4526 MOS_DBG("I915_CONTEXT_PARAM_VM failed: %s\n",
4527 strerror(errno));
4528 free(context);
4529 return nullptr;
4530 }
4531
4532 ret = mos_gem_ctx_set_user_ctx_params(context);
4533
4534 return context;
4535}
4536
4537static int mos_bufmgr_query_engines_count(struct mos_bufmgr *bufmgr,
4538 unsigned int *nengine)
4539{
4540 assert(bufmgr);
4541 assert(nengine);
4542 struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem = (struct mos_bufmgr_gem *)bufmgr;
4543 if (BufmgrPrelim::IsPrelimSupported()) {
4544 return bufmgr_gem->prelim->QueryEnginesCount(nengine);
4545 }
4546 int fd = ((struct mos_bufmgr_gem*)bufmgr)->fd;
4547 struct drm_i915_query query;
4548 struct drm_i915_query_item query_item;
4549 struct drm_i915_query_engine_info *engines = nullptr;
4550 int ret, len;
4551
4552 memclear(query_item);
4553 query_item.query_id = DRM_I915_QUERY_ENGINE_INFO;
4554 query_item.length = 0;
4555 memclear(query);
4556 query.num_items = 1;
4557 query.items_ptr = (uintptr_t)&query_item;
4558
4559 ret = drmIoctl(fd, DRM_IOCTL_I915_QUERY, &query);
4560 if (ret || query_item.length == 0)
4561 {
4562 *nengine = 0;
4563 return ret;
4564 }
4565
4566 len = query_item.length;
4567
4568 engines = (drm_i915_query_engine_info *)malloc(len);
4569 if (nullptr == engines)
4570 {
4571 *nengine = 0;
4572 ret = -ENOMEM;
4573 return ret;
4574 }
4575
4576 memset(engines, 0, len);
4577 memclear(query_item);
4578 query_item.query_id = DRM_I915_QUERY_ENGINE_INFO;
4579 query_item.length = len;
4580 query_item.data_ptr = (uintptr_t)engines;
4581 memclear(query);
4582 query.num_items = 1;
4583 query.items_ptr = (uintptr_t)&query_item;
4584
4585 ret = drmIoctl(fd, DRM_IOCTL_I915_QUERY, &query);
4586
4587 *nengine = ret ? 0 : engines->num_engines;
4588
4589 if(engines)
4590 {
4591 free(engines);
4592 }
4593 return ret;
4594}
4595
4596static int mos_bufmgr_query_engines(struct mos_bufmgr *bufmgr,
4597 __u16 engine_class,
4598 __u64 caps,
4599 unsigned int *nengine,
4600 void *engine_map)
4601{
4602 struct i915_engine_class_instance *ci = (struct i915_engine_class_instance *)engine_map;
4603 if((bufmgr == nullptr) || (nengine == nullptr) || (ci == nullptr))
4604 {
4605 return -EINVAL;
4606 }
4607
4608 struct drm_i915_query query;
4609 struct drm_i915_query_item query_item;
4610 struct drm_i915_query_engine_info *engines = nullptr;
4611 int ret, len;
4612 struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem = (struct mos_bufmgr_gem *)bufmgr;
4613 if (BufmgrPrelim::IsPrelimSupported()) {
4614 return bufmgr_gem->prelim->QueryEngines(bufmgr_gem->has_lmem,
4615 engine_class,
4616 caps,
4617 nengine,
4618 ci);
4619 }
4620
4621 int fd = bufmgr_gem->fd;
4622
4623 memclear(query_item);
4624 query_item.query_id = DRM_I915_QUERY_ENGINE_INFO;
4625 query_item.length = 0;
4626 memclear(query);
4627 query.num_items = 1;
4628 query.items_ptr = (uintptr_t)&query_item;
4629
4630 ret = drmIoctl(fd, DRM_IOCTL_I915_QUERY, &query);
4631 if (ret)
4632 {
4633 goto fini;
4634 }
4635
4636 len = query_item.length;
4637 if(len == 0)
4638 {
4639 goto fini;
4640 }
4641
4642 engines = (drm_i915_query_engine_info *)malloc(len);
4643 if (nullptr == engines)
4644 {
4645 ret = -ENOMEM;
4646 goto fini;
4647 }
4648 memset(engines,0,len);
4649 memclear(query_item);
4650 query_item.query_id = DRM_I915_QUERY_ENGINE_INFO;
4651 query_item.length = len;
4652 query_item.data_ptr = (uintptr_t)engines;
4653 memclear(query);
4654 query.num_items = 1;
4655 query.items_ptr = (uintptr_t)&query_item;
4656
4657 ret = drmIoctl(fd, DRM_IOCTL_I915_QUERY, &query);
4658 if (ret)
4659 {
4660 goto fini;
4661 }
4662
4663 int i, num;
4664 for (i = 0, num = 0; i < engines->num_engines; i++) {
4665 struct drm_i915_engine_info *engine =
4666 (struct drm_i915_engine_info *)&engines->engines[i];
4667 if ( engine_class == engine->engine.engine_class
4668 && ((caps & engine->capabilities) == caps ))
4669 {
4670 ci->engine_class = engine_class;
4671 ci->engine_instance = engine->engine.engine_instance;
4672 ci++;
4673 num++;
4674 }
4675 if (num > *nengine)
4676 {
4677 fprintf(stderr,"%s: Number of engine instances out of range, %d,%d\n",
4678 __FUNCTION__, num, *nengine);
4679 goto fini;
4680 }
4681 }
4682 *nengine = num;
4683
4684
4685fini:
4686 if (engines)
4687 free(engines);
4688 return ret;
4689}
4690
4691static size_t mos_bufmgr_get_engine_class_size()
4692{
4693 return sizeof(struct i915_engine_class_instance);
4694}
4695
4696static int
4697mos_bufmgr_query_sys_engines(struct mos_bufmgr *bufmgr, MEDIA_SYSTEM_INFO* gfx_info)
4698{
4699 struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem = (struct mos_bufmgr_gem *)bufmgr;
4700 int ret;
4701
4702 if (nullptr == gfx_info)
4703 {
4704 return -EINVAL;
4705 }
4706
4707 unsigned int maxNengine = 0;
4708 if((gfx_info->VDBoxInfo.NumberOfVDBoxEnabled == 0)
4709 || (gfx_info->VEBoxInfo.NumberOfVEBoxEnabled == 0))
4710 {
4711 if (mos_query_engines_count(bufmgr, &maxNengine) || (maxNengine == 0))
4712 {
4713 MOS_OS_ASSERTMESSAGE("Failed to query engines count.\n");
4714 return -ENODEV;
4715 }
4716 }
4717
4718 if (gfx_info->VDBoxInfo.NumberOfVDBoxEnabled == 0)
4719 {
4720 unsigned int nengine = maxNengine;
4721 struct i915_engine_class_instance *uengines = nullptr;
4722 uengines = (struct i915_engine_class_instance *)MOS_AllocAndZeroMemory(nengine * sizeof(struct i915_engine_class_instance));
4723 if (nullptr == uengines)
4724 {
4725 return -ENOMEM;
4726 }
4727 ret = mos_bufmgr_query_engines(bufmgr, I915_ENGINE_CLASS_VIDEO, 0, &nengine, (void *)uengines);
4728 if (ret)
4729 {
4730 MOS_OS_ASSERTMESSAGE("Failed to query vdbox engine\n");
4731 MOS_SafeFreeMemory(uengines);
4732 return -ENODEV;
4733 }
4734 else
4735 {
4736 gfx_info->VDBoxInfo.NumberOfVDBoxEnabled = nengine;
4737 }
4738
4739 for (int i=0; i<nengine; i++)
4740 {
4741 gfx_info->VDBoxInfo.Instances.VDBoxEnableMask |= 1<<uengines[i].engine_instance;
4742 }
4743
4744 MOS_SafeFreeMemory(uengines);
4745 }
4746
4747 if (gfx_info->VEBoxInfo.NumberOfVEBoxEnabled == 0)
4748 {
4749 unsigned int nengine = maxNengine;
4750 struct i915_engine_class_instance *uengines = nullptr;
4751 uengines = (struct i915_engine_class_instance *)MOS_AllocAndZeroMemory(nengine * sizeof(struct i915_engine_class_instance));
4752 if (nullptr == uengines)
4753 {
4754 return -ENOMEM;
4755 }
4756 ret = mos_bufmgr_query_engines(bufmgr, I915_ENGINE_CLASS_VIDEO_ENHANCE, 0, &nengine, (void *)uengines);
4757 if (ret)
4758 {
4759 MOS_OS_ASSERTMESSAGE("Failed to query vebox engine\n");
4760 MOS_SafeFreeMemory(uengines);
4761 return -ENODEV;
4762 }
4763 else
4764 {
4765 MOS_OS_ASSERT(nengine <= maxNengine);
4766 gfx_info->VEBoxInfo.NumberOfVEBoxEnabled = nengine;
4767 }
4768
4769 MOS_SafeFreeMemory(uengines);
4770 }
4771
4772 return 0;
4773}

4775static int mos_gem_set_context_param_parallel(struct mos_linux_context *ctx,
4776 struct i915_engine_class_instance *ci,
4777 unsigned int count)
4778{
4779 if((ctx == nullptr) || (ci == nullptr) || (count <= 0))
4780 {
4781 return -EINVAL;
4782 }
4783
4784 struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem = (struct mos_bufmgr_gem *)ctx->bufmgr;
4785 if (BufmgrPrelim::IsPrelimSupported()) {
4786 return BufmgrPrelim::SetContextParamParallel(
4787 ctx,
4788 ci,
4789 count);
4790 }
4791
4792 int ret = 0;
4793 uint32_t size = 0;
4794 int n;
4795 struct i915_context_engines_parallel_submit* parallel_submit = nullptr;
4796 struct i915_context_param_engines* set_engines = nullptr;
4797
4798 size = sizeof(struct i915_context_engines_parallel_submit) + count * sizeof(*ci);
4799 parallel_submit = (struct i915_context_engines_parallel_submit*)malloc(size);
4800 if(parallel_submit == nullptr)
4801 {
4802 ret = -ENOMEM;
4803 goto fini;
4804 }
4805 memset(parallel_submit, 0, size);
4806 parallel_submit->base.name = I915_CONTEXT_ENGINES_EXT_PARALLEL_SUBMIT;
4807 parallel_submit->engine_index = 0;
4808 parallel_submit->width = count;
4809 parallel_submit->num_siblings = 1;
4810 for(int i = 0; i < count; i++)
4811 {
4812 parallel_submit->engines[i] = ci[i];
4813 }
4814
4815 /* I915_DEFINE_CONTEXT_PARAM_ENGINES */
4816 size = sizeof(struct i915_context_param_engines) + sizeof(struct i915_engine_class_instance);
4817 set_engines = (struct i915_context_param_engines*) malloc(size);
4818 if(set_engines == nullptr)
4819 {
4820 ret = -ENOMEM;
4821 goto fini;
4822 }
4823 set_engines->extensions = (uintptr_t)(parallel_submit);
4824 set_engines->engines[0].engine_class = I915_ENGINE_CLASS_INVALID;
4825 set_engines->engines[0].engine_instance = I915_ENGINE_CLASS_INVALID_NONE;
4826
4827 ret = mos_set_context_param(ctx,
4828 size,
4829 I915_CONTEXT_PARAM_ENGINES,
4830 (uintptr_t)set_engines);
4831fini:
4832 if (set_engines)
4833 free(set_engines);
4834 if (parallel_submit)
4835 free(parallel_submit);
4836 return ret;
4837}

4849 MOS_OS_CHECK_CONDITION(count == 0, "Invalid input parameter. Number of engines must be > 0.", EINVAL);
4850

4860 balancer->base.name = I915_CONTEXT_ENGINES_EXT_LOAD_BALANCE;
4861 balancer->num_siblings = count;
4862 memcpy(balancer->engines, ci, count * sizeof(*ci));
4863

4865 size = sizeof(uint64_t) + sizeof(*ci);
4866 set_engines = (struct i915_context_param_engines*) malloc(size);
4867 if (nullptr == set_engines)
4868 {
4869 ret = -ENOMEM;
4870 goto fini;
4871 }
4872 set_engines->extensions = (uintptr_t)(balancer);
4873 set_engines->engines[0].engine_class = I915_ENGINE_CLASS_INVALID;
4874 set_engines->engines[0].engine_instance = I915_ENGINE_CLASS_INVALID_NONE;
4875
4876 ret = mos_set_context_param(ctx,
4877 size,
4878 I915_CONTEXT_PARAM_ENGINES,
4879 (uintptr_t)set_engines);
4880fini:
4881 if (nullptr != set_engines)
4882 free(set_engines);
4883 if (nullptr != balancer)
4884 free(balancer);
4885 return ret;
4886}

4945fini:

4951 free(balancer);

4973
4974static int mos_bufmgr_query_device_blob(struct mos_bufmgr *bufmgr, MEDIA_SYSTEM_INFO* gfx_info)
4975{
4976 if ((bufmgr == nullptr) || (gfx_info == nullptr))
4977 {
4978 return -EINVAL;
4979 }
4980
4981 struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem = (struct mos_bufmgr_gem*)bufmgr;
4982 if (bufmgr_gem == nullptr)
4983 {
4984 return -EINVAL;
4985 }
4986 int fd = bufmgr_gem->fd;
4987 uint32_t *hw_info = nullptr;
4988 uint32_t ulength= 0;
4989 int ret, i;
4990 struct drm_i915_query_item query_item;
4991
4992 memclear(query_item);
4993 query_item.length = 0;
4994 query_item.query_id = DRM_I915_QUERY_HWCONFIG_BLOB;
4995 ret = mos_gem_query_items(fd, &query_item, 1);
4996 if (ret != 0 || query_item.length <= 0)
4997 {
4998 mos_safe_free(hw_info);
4999 return (ret != 0) ? ret : -1;
5000 }
5001
5002 hw_info = (uint32_t*) malloc(query_item.length);
5003 if (hw_info != nullptr)
5004 {
5005 memset(hw_info, 0, query_item.length);
5006 }
5007 else
5008 {
5009 mos_safe_free(hw_info);
5010 return -ENOMEM;
5011 }
5012 query_item.data_ptr = (uintptr_t) hw_info;
5013 ret = mos_gem_query_items(fd, &query_item, 1);
5014 if (ret != 0 || query_item.length <= 0)
5015 {
5016 mos_safe_free(hw_info);
5017 return (ret != 0) ? ret : -1;
5018 }
5019 ulength = query_item.length / sizeof(uint32_t);
5020 i = 0;
5021 while (i < ulength) {
5022 /* Attribute ID starts with 1 */
5023 if (hw_info[i] <= 0)
5024 {
5025 mos_safe_free(hw_info);
5026 return -EINVAL;
5027 }
5028
5029 #if DEBUG_BLOB_QUERY
5030 fprintf("%s: %d\n", key_string[hw_info[i]], hw_info[i+2]);
5031 #endif
5032 if (INTEL_HWCONFIG_MAX_SLICES_SUPPORTED == hw_info[i])
5033 {
5034 if (hw_info[i+1] != 1)
5035 {
5036 mos_safe_free(hw_info);
5037 return -EINVAL;
5038 }
5039 gfx_info->SliceCount = hw_info[i+2];
5040 gfx_info->MaxSlicesSupported = hw_info[i+2];
5041 }
5042
5043 if (INTEL_HWCONFIG_MAX_DUAL_SUBSLICES_SUPPORTED == hw_info[i])
5044 {
5045 if (hw_info[i+1] != 1)
5046 {
5047 mos_safe_free(hw_info);
5048 return -EINVAL;
5049 }
5050 gfx_info->SubSliceCount = hw_info[i+2];
5051 gfx_info->MaxSubSlicesSupported = hw_info[i+2];
5052 }
5053
5054 if (INTEL_HWCONFIG_MAX_NUM_EU_PER_DSS == hw_info[i])
5055 {
5056 if (hw_info[i+1] != 1)
5057 {
5058 mos_safe_free(hw_info);
5059 return -EINVAL;
5060 }
5061 gfx_info->MaxEuPerSubSlice = hw_info[i+2];
5062 }
5063
5064 if (INTEL_HWCONFIG_L3_CACHE_SIZE_IN_KB == hw_info[i])
5065 {
5066 if (hw_info[i+1] != 1)
5067 {
5068 mos_safe_free(hw_info);
5069 return -EINVAL;
5070 }
5071 gfx_info->L3CacheSizeInKb = hw_info[i+2];
5072 }
5073
5074 if (INTEL_HWCONFIG_NUM_THREADS_PER_EU == hw_info[i])
5075 {
5076 if (hw_info[i+1] != 1)
5077 {
5078 mos_safe_free(hw_info);
5079 return -EINVAL;
5080 }
5081 gfx_info->NumThreadsPerEu = hw_info[i+2];
5082 }
5083
5084 if (INTEL_HWCONFIG_MAX_VECS == hw_info[i])
5085 {
5086 if (hw_info[i+1] != 1)
5087 {
5088 mos_safe_free(hw_info);
5089 return -EINVAL;
5090 }
5091 gfx_info->MaxVECS = hw_info[i+2];
5092 }
5093
5094 /* Advance to next key */
5095 i += hw_info[i + 1]; // value size
5096 i += 2;// KL size
5097 }
5098
5099 if (hw_info != nullptr)
5100 {
5101 mos_safe_free(hw_info);
5102 hw_info = nullptr;
5103 }
5104
5105 return ret;
5106}

5145mos_bufmgr_enable_turbo_boost(struct mos_bufmgr *bufmgr)

5164static struct mos_bufmgr *
5165mos_bufmgr_gem_init_i915(int fd, int batch_size)
5166{
5167 struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem;
5168 struct drm_i915_gem_get_aperture aperture;
5169 drm_i915_getparam_t gp;
5170 int ret, tmp;
5171 bool exec2 = false;
5172
5173 pthread_mutex_lock(&bufmgr_list_mutex);
5174
5175 bufmgr_gem = mos_bufmgr_gem_find(fd);
5176 if (bufmgr_gem)
5177 goto exit;
5178
5179 bufmgr_gem = (struct mos_bufmgr_gem *)calloc(1, sizeof(*bufmgr_gem));
5180 if (bufmgr_gem == nullptr)
5181 goto exit;
5182
5183 bufmgr_gem->fd = fd;
5184 atomic_set(&bufmgr_gem->refcount, 1);
5185
5186 if (pthread_mutex_init(&bufmgr_gem->lock, nullptr) != 0) {
5187 free(bufmgr_gem);
5188 bufmgr_gem = nullptr;
5189 goto exit;
5190 }
5191
5192 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_alloc = mos_gem_bo_alloc;
5193 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_alloc_for_render =
5194 mos_gem_bo_alloc_for_render;
5195 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_alloc_tiled = mos_gem_bo_alloc_tiled;
5196 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_reference = mos_gem_bo_reference;
5197 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_unreference = mos_gem_bo_unreference;
5198 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_map = mos_gem_bo_map;
5199 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_unmap = mos_gem_bo_unmap;
5200 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_wait_rendering = mos_gem_bo_wait_rendering;
5201 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_pad_to_size = mos_gem_bo_pad_to_size;
5202 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_emit_reloc = mos_gem_bo_emit_reloc;
5203 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_get_tiling = mos_gem_bo_get_tiling;
5204 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_set_tiling = mos_gem_bo_set_tiling;
5205 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_flink = mos_gem_bo_flink;
5206 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_exec = mos_gem_bo_exec2;
5207 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_mrb_exec = mos_gem_bo_mrb_exec2;
5208 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_busy = mos_gem_bo_busy;
5209 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_madvise = mos_gem_bo_madvise;
5210 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.destroy = mos_bufmgr_gem_unref;
5211 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.debug = 0;
5212 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.check_aperture_space =
5213 mos_gem_check_aperture_space;
5214 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_disable_reuse = mos_gem_bo_disable_reuse;
5215 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_is_reusable = mos_gem_bo_is_reusable;
5216 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_references = mos_gem_bo_references;
5217
5218 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_wait = mos_gem_bo_wait;
5219 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_clear_relocs = mos_gem_bo_clear_relocs;
5220 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.context_create = mos_gem_context_create;
5221 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.context_create_ext = mos_gem_context_create_ext;
5222 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.context_create_shared = mos_gem_context_create_shared;
5223 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.context_destroy = mos_gem_context_destroy;
5224 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.vm_create = mos_gem_vm_create;
5225 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.vm_destroy = mos_gem_vm_destroy;
5226 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_context_exec2 = mos_gem_bo_context_exec2;
5227 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_context_exec3 = mos_gem_bo_context_exec3;
5228 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_is_exec_object_async = mos_gem_bo_is_exec_object_async;
5229 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_is_softpin = mos_gem_bo_is_softpin;
5230 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_map_gtt = mos_gem_bo_map_gtt;
5231 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_unmap_gtt = mos_gem_bo_unmap_gtt;
5232 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_map_wc = mos_gem_bo_map_wc;
5233 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_unmap_wc = mos_gem_bo_unmap_wc;
5234 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_map_unsynchronized = mos_gem_bo_map_unsynchronized;
5235 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_start_gtt_access = mos_gem_bo_start_gtt_access;
5236 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_get_softpin_targets_info = mos_bufmgr_bo_get_softpin_targets_info;
5237 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_create_from_name = mos_bufmgr_bo_gem_create_from_name;
5238 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.enable_reuse = mos_gem_enable_reuse;
5239 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.enable_softpin = mos_gem_enable_softpin;
5240 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.enable_vmbind = mos_gem_enable_vmbind;
5241 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.disable_object_capture = mos_gem_disable_object_capture;
5242 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.get_memory_info = mos_gem_get_memory_info;
5243 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.get_devid = mos_gem_get_devid;
5244 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.set_context_param = mos_gem_set_context_param;
5245 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.set_context_param_parallel = mos_gem_set_context_param_parallel;
5246 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.set_context_param_load_balance = mos_gem_set_context_param_load_balance;
5247 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.set_context_param_bond = mos_gem_set_context_param_bond;
5248 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.get_context_param = mos_gem_get_context_param;
5249 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_create_from_prime = mos_gem_bo_create_from_prime;
5250 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_export_to_prime = mos_gem_bo_export_to_prime;
5251 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.reg_read = mos_bufmg_reg_read;
5252 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.get_reset_stats = mos_bufmg_get_reset_stats;
5253 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.get_context_param_sseu = mos_bufmgr_get_context_param_sseu;
5254 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.set_context_param_sseu = mos_bufmgr_set_context_param_sseu;
5255 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.query_sys_engines = mos_bufmgr_query_sys_engines;
5256 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.query_device_blob = mos_bufmgr_query_device_blob;
5257 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.get_driver_info = mos_bufmgr_get_driver_info;
5258 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.query_hw_ip_version = mos_bufmgr_query_hw_ip_version;
5259 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.get_platform_information = mos_bufmgr_get_platform_information;
5260 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.set_platform_information = mos_bufmgr_set_platform_information;
5261 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.query_engines_count = mos_bufmgr_query_engines_count;
5262 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.query_engines = mos_bufmgr_query_engines;
5263 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.get_engine_class_size = mos_bufmgr_get_engine_class_size;
5264 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.switch_off_n_bits = mos_bufmgr_switch_off_n_bits;
5265 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.hweight8 = mos_bufmgr_hweight8;
5266 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.get_ts_frequency = mos_bufmgr_get_ts_frequency;
5267 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.has_bsd2 = mos_bufmgr_has_bsd2;
5268 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.enable_turbo_boost = mos_bufmgr_enable_turbo_boost;
5269
5270 bufmgr_gem->mem_profiler_path = getenv("MEDIA_MEMORY_PROFILER_LOG");
5271 if (bufmgr_gem->mem_profiler_path != nullptr)
5272 {
5273 if (strcmp(bufmgr_gem->mem_profiler_path, "/sys/kernel/debug/tracing/trace_marker") == 0)
5274 {
5275 ret = bufmgr_gem->mem_profiler_fd = open(bufmgr_gem->mem_profiler_path, O_WRONLY );
5276 }
5277 else
5278 {
5279 ret = bufmgr_gem->mem_profiler_fd = open(bufmgr_gem->mem_profiler_path, O_WRONLY | O_CREAT | O_TRUNC, S_IRUSR | S_IWUSR);
5280 }
5281
5282 if (ret == -1)
5283 {
5284 MOS_DBG("Failed to open %s: %s\n", bufmgr_gem->mem_profiler_path, strerror(errno));
5285 }
5286 }
5287 else
5288 {
5289 bufmgr_gem->mem_profiler_fd = -1;
5290 }
5291
5292 memclear(aperture);
5293 ret = drmIoctl(bufmgr_gem->fd,
5294 DRM_IOCTL_I915_GEM_GET_APERTURE,
5295 &aperture);
5296
5297 if (ret == 0)
5298 bufmgr_gem->gtt_size = aperture.aper_available_size;
5299 else {
5300 fprintf(stderr, "DRM_IOCTL_I915_GEM_APERTURE failed: %s\n",
5301 strerror(errno));
5302 bufmgr_gem->gtt_size = 128 * 1024 * 1024;
5303 fprintf(stderr, "Assuming %dkB available aperture size.\n"
5304 "May lead to reduced performance or incorrect "
5305 "rendering.\n",
5306 (int)bufmgr_gem->gtt_size / 1024);
5307 }
5308
5309 /* support Gen 8+ */
5310 bufmgr_gem->pci_device = get_pci_device_id(bufmgr_gem);
5311
5312 if (bufmgr_gem->pci_device == 0) {
5313 pthread_mutex_destroy(&bufmgr_gem->lock);
5314 if (bufmgr_gem->mem_profiler_fd != -1)
5315 {
5316 close(bufmgr_gem->mem_profiler_fd);
5317 }
5318 free(bufmgr_gem);
5319 bufmgr_gem = nullptr;
5320 goto exit;
5321 }
5322
5323 memclear(gp);
5324 gp.value = &tmp;
5325
5326 gp.param = I915_PARAM_HAS_EXECBUF2;
5327 ret = drmIoctl(bufmgr_gem->fd, DRM_IOCTL_I915_GETPARAM, &gp);
5328 if (!ret)
5329 exec2 = true;
5330
5331 gp.param = I915_PARAM_HAS_BSD;
5332 ret = drmIoctl(bufmgr_gem->fd, DRM_IOCTL_I915_GETPARAM, &gp);
5333 bufmgr_gem->has_bsd = ret == 0;
5334
5335 gp.param = I915_PARAM_HAS_BSD2;
5336 ret = drmIoctl(bufmgr_gem->fd, DRM_IOCTL_I915_GETPARAM, &gp);
5337 bufmgr_gem->has_bsd2 = (ret == 0 && *gp.value != 0);
5338
5339 gp.param = I915_PARAM_HAS_BLT;
5340 ret = drmIoctl(bufmgr_gem->fd, DRM_IOCTL_I915_GETPARAM, &gp);
5341 bufmgr_gem->has_blt = ret == 0;
5342
5343 gp.param = I915_PARAM_HAS_RELAXED_FENCING;
5344 ret = drmIoctl(bufmgr_gem->fd, DRM_IOCTL_I915_GETPARAM, &gp);
5345 bufmgr_gem->has_relaxed_fencing = ret == 0;
5346
5347 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_alloc_userptr = check_bo_alloc_userptr;
5348
5349 gp.param = I915_PARAM_HAS_WAIT_TIMEOUT;
5350 ret = drmIoctl(bufmgr_gem->fd, DRM_IOCTL_I915_GETPARAM, &gp);
5351 bufmgr_gem->has_wait_timeout = ret == 0;
5352
5353 gp.param = I915_PARAM_HAS_LLC;
5354 ret = drmIoctl(bufmgr_gem->fd, DRM_IOCTL_I915_GETPARAM, &gp);
5355 bufmgr_gem->has_llc = *gp.value;
5356
5357 gp.param = I915_PARAM_HAS_VEBOX;
5358 ret = drmIoctl(bufmgr_gem->fd, DRM_IOCTL_I915_GETPARAM, &gp);
5359 bufmgr_gem->has_vebox = (ret == 0) & (*gp.value > 0);
5360
5361 gp.param = I915_PARAM_MMAP_VERSION;
5362 ret = drmIoctl(bufmgr_gem->fd, DRM_IOCTL_I915_GETPARAM, &gp);
5363 bufmgr_gem->has_ext_mmap = (ret == 0) & (*gp.value > 0);
5364
5365 gp.param = I915_PARAM_NUM_FENCES_AVAIL;
5366 ret = drmIoctl(bufmgr_gem->fd, DRM_IOCTL_I915_GETPARAM, &gp);
5367 bufmgr_gem->has_fence_reg = (ret == 0) & (*gp.value > 0);
5368
5369 gp.param = I915_PARAM_HAS_EXEC_SOFTPIN;
5370 ret = drmIoctl(bufmgr_gem->fd, DRM_IOCTL_I915_GETPARAM, &gp);
5371 if (ret == 0 && *gp.value > 0) {
5372 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_set_softpin = mos_gem_bo_set_softpin;
5373 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_add_softpin_target = mos_gem_bo_add_softpin_target;
5374 }
5375
5376 gp.param = I915_PARAM_HAS_EXEC_ASYNC;
5377 ret = drmIoctl(bufmgr_gem->fd, DRM_IOCTL_I915_GETPARAM, &gp);
5378 if (ret == 0 && *gp.value > 0) {
5379 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.set_object_async = mos_gem_bo_set_object_async;
5380 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.set_exec_object_async = mos_gem_bo_set_exec_object_async;
5381 }
5382
5383 gp.param = I915_PARAM_HAS_EXEC_CAPTURE;
5384 ret = drmIoctl(bufmgr_gem->fd, DRM_IOCTL_I915_GETPARAM, &gp);
5385 if (ret == 0 && *gp.value > 0)
5386 {
5387 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.set_object_capture = mos_gem_bo_set_object_capture;
5388 }
5389 else
5390 {
5391 bufmgr_gem->object_capture_disabled = true;
5392 }
5393
5394 gp.param = I915_PARAM_MMAP_GTT_VERSION;
5395 ret = drmIoctl(fd, DRM_IOCTL_I915_GETPARAM, &gp);
5396 bufmgr_gem->has_mmap_offset = (ret == 0) && (*gp.value >= 4);
5397
5398 gp.param = I915_PARAM_CS_TIMESTAMP_FREQUENCY;
5399 ret = drmIoctl(fd, DRM_IOCTL_I915_GETPARAM, &gp);
5400 bufmgr_gem->ts_freq = (ret == 0) ? *gp.value : 0;
5401
5402 struct drm_i915_gem_context_param context_param;
5403 memset(&context_param, 0, sizeof(context_param));
5404 context_param.param = I915_CONTEXT_PARAM_GTT_SIZE;
5405 ret = drmIoctl(bufmgr_gem->fd, DRM_IOCTL_I915_GEM_CONTEXT_GETPARAM, &context_param);
5406 if (ret == 0){
5407 uint64_t gtt_size_4g = (uint64_t)1 << 32;
5408 if (context_param.value > gtt_size_4g)
5409 {
5410 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.bo_use_48b_address_range = mos_gem_bo_use_48b_address_range;
5411 }
5412 }
5413
5414 bufmgr_gem->prelim = BufmgrPrelim::CreatePrelim(bufmgr_gem->fd);
5415
5416 bufmgr_gem->has_lmem = mos_gem_has_lmem(bufmgr_gem);
5417
5418 bufmgr_gem->device_type = DEVICE_TYPE_I915;
5419
5420 if (nullptr != bufmgr_gem->prelim) {
5421 bufmgr_gem->prelim->Init(bufmgr_gem->bufmgr, bufmgr_gem->has_lmem);
5422 }
5423
5424 if (!BufmgrPrelim::IsPrelimSupported()) {
5425 bufmgr_gem->bufmgr.has_full_vd = true;
5426 }
5427
5428 /* Let's go with one relocation per every 2 dwords (but round down a bit
5429 * since a power of two will mean an extra page allocation for the reloc
5430 * buffer).
5431 *
5432 * Every 4 was too few for the blender benchmark.
5433 */
5434 bufmgr_gem->max_relocs = batch_size / sizeof(uint32_t) / 2 - 2;
5435
5436 DRMINITLISTHEAD(&bufmgr_gem->named);
5437 init_cache_buckets(bufmgr_gem);
5438
5439 DRMLISTADD(&bufmgr_gem->managers, &bufmgr_list);
5440
5441 bufmgr_gem->use_softpin = false;
5442 mos_vma_heap_init(&bufmgr_gem->vma_heap[MEMZONE_SYS], MEMZONE_SYS_START, MEMZONE_SYS_SIZE);
5443 mos_vma_heap_init(&bufmgr_gem->vma_heap[MEMZONE_DEVICE], MEMZONE_DEVICE_START, MEMZONE_DEVICE_SIZE);
5444 if (BufmgrPrelim::IsPrelimSupported()) {
5445 bufmgr_gem->prelim->InitVmaHeap(&bufmgr_gem->vma_heap[MEMZONE_PRIME]);
5446 }
5447
5448exit:
5449 pthread_mutex_unlock(&bufmgr_list_mutex);
5450
5451 return bufmgr_gem != nullptr ? &bufmgr_gem->bufmgr : nullptr;
5452}
5453
5454struct mos_bufmgr *
5455mos_bufmgr_gem_init(int fd, int batch_size, int *device_type)
5456{
5457 int type = mos_query_device_type(fd);
5458 if (device_type != nullptr)
5459 {
5460 *device_type = type;
5461 }
5462 if(DEVICE_TYPE_I915 == type)
5463 {
5464 return mos_bufmgr_gem_init_i915(fd, batch_size);
5465 }
5466
5467 return nullptr;
5468}
5469
5470int mos_get_param(int fd, int32_t param, uint32_t *param_value)
5471{
5472 if((fd < 0) || (param_value == nullptr))
5473 {
5474 return -EINVAL;
5475 }
5476
5477 struct drm_i915_getparam gp;
5478 gp.param = param;
5479 gp.value = (int32_t *)param_value;
5480
5481 return drmIoctl(fd, DRM_IOCTL_I915_GETPARAM, &gp) == 0;
5482}
5483
5484static int mos_bufmgr_get_driver_info(struct mos_bufmgr *bufmgr, struct LinuxDriverInfo *drvInfo)
5485{
5486 if (bufmgr == nullptr || drvInfo == nullptr)
5487 {
5488 return -EINVAL;
5489 }
5490 struct mos_bufmgr_gem *bufmgr_gem = (struct mos_bufmgr_gem*)bufmgr;
5491 int fd = bufmgr_gem->fd;
5492 if (fd < 0)
5493 {
5494 return -EINVAL;
5495 }
5496 uint32_t retValue = 0;
5497
5498 drvInfo->hasBsd = 0;
5499 if (mos_get_param(fd, I915_PARAM_HAS_BSD, &retValue))
5500 {
5501 drvInfo->hasBsd = !!retValue;
5502 }
5503
5504 drvInfo->hasBsd2 = 0;
5505 retValue = 0;
5506 if (mos_get_param(fd, I915_PARAM_HAS_BSD2, &retValue))
5507 {
5508 drvInfo->hasBsd2 = !!retValue;
5509 }
5510
5511 drvInfo->hasVebox = 0;
5512 retValue = 0;
5513 if (mos_get_param(fd, I915_PARAM_HAS_VEBOX, &retValue))
5514 {
5515 drvInfo->hasVebox = !!retValue;
5516 }
5517
5518 drvInfo->hasPpgtt = 1;
5519 retValue = 0;
5520 if (mos_get_param(fd, I915_PARAM_HAS_ALIASING_PPGTT, &retValue))
5521 {
5522 drvInfo->hasPpgtt = !!retValue;
5523 }
5524
5525 drvInfo->hasHuc = 0;
5526 retValue = 0;
5527 if (mos_get_param(fd, I915_PARAM_HUC_STATUS, &retValue))
5528 {
5529 drvInfo->hasHuc = !!retValue;
5530 if (retValue == 1)
5531 {
5532 drvInfo->hasProtectedHuc = 1;
5533 }
5534 }
5535
5536 drvInfo->devId = 0;
5537 retValue = 0;
5538 if (mos_get_param(fd, I915_PARAM_CHIPSET_ID, &retValue))
5539 {
5540 drvInfo->devId = retValue;
5541 }
5542 drvInfo->devRev = 0;
5543 retValue = 0;
5544 if (mos_get_param(fd, I915_PARAM_REVISION, &retValue))
5545 {
5546 drvInfo->devRev = retValue;
5547 }
5548
5549 drvInfo->euCount = 0;
5550 retValue = 0;
5551 if (mos_get_param(fd, I915_PARAM_EU_TOTAL, &retValue))
5552 {
5553 drvInfo->euCount = retValue;
5554 }
5555
5556 drvInfo->subSliceCount = 0;
5557 retValue = 0;
5558 if (mos_get_param(fd, I915_PARAM_SUBSLICE_TOTAL, &retValue))
5559 {
5560 drvInfo->subSliceCount = retValue;
5561 }
5562
5563 // There is no interface to read total slice count from drm/i915, so we
5564 // will set the slice count in InitMediaSysInfo accordint to Device ID.
5565 drvInfo->sliceCount = 0;
5566
5567 return 0;
5568}
5569static int mos_get_dev_id_i915(int fd, uint32_t *device_id)
5570{
5571 if (nullptr == device_id)
5572 {
5573 return -EINVAL;
5574 }
5575 uint32_t retValue = 0;
5576 if (mos_get_param(fd, I915_PARAM_CHIPSET_ID, &retValue))
5577 {
5578 *device_id = retValue;
5579 }
5580
5581 return 0;
5582}
5583
5584int mos_get_device_id(int fd, uint32_t *deviceId)
5585{
5586 int device_type = mos_query_device_type(fd);
5587
5588 if (DEVICE_TYPE_I915 == device_type)
5589 {
5590 return mos_get_dev_id_i915(fd, deviceId);
5591 }
5592
5593 return -ENODEV;
5594}
